doc:
Afshan Azad https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afshan_Azad 0 Afshan Azad (born 12 February 1989) is a British actress and model. She is best known for playing the role of Padma Patil in the Harry Potter film series, beginning in 2005 with Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire. In Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, Padma was portrayed by Sharon Sandhu. Afshan_Azad ( born 12_February_1989 ) is a_British_actress_and_model . She is_best_known for playing the_role of Padma_Patil in the_Harry_Potter_film_series , beginning in 2005 with Harry_Potter and the_Goblet of Fire . In Harry_Potter and the_Prisoner of Azkaban , Padma was_portrayed by Sharon_Sandhu .
